author: dkhaywood
msg: more work on the cglib object factory; added full set of tests & refactored ResolveState; documentation/formatting of the Hibernate Object Store

author: dkhaywood
msg: initial work on providing a pluggable ObjectFactory (the intent being to use Cglib to enhance pojos); ObjectFactory and ClassStrategy are now propogated down into JavaReflector/JavaSpecification/JavaIntrospector, and #loadSpecification() semantics changed to potentially return a null for a class (eg CGLib-specific) that should be skipped.  Not yet fully working, but the default impl (JavaObjectFactory) does still work and all tests are passing.

author: dkhaywood
msg: progammingmodel-xat-impl: Deleted JavaNotifyingReflector, instead JavaNotifyingReflectorInstaller just uses a regular JavaReflector but passes a JavaNotifyingDomainObjectContainer.

author: dkhaywood
msg: metamodel: added new ObjectFactory that will allow pojos to be created polymorphically (rather than hard-coded in depths of JavaSpecification).
